text: Harry Dornbrand (November 10, 1922 - May 8, 2022) was an American aerospace engineer. He was vice president, then President of Fairchild Industries Space and Electronics division. He was also President of American Satellite Corporation. He was a member of the American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics. In 1974 he was awarded the NASA Distinguished Public Service Medal. He helped managed the ATS-6 satellite program. Dornbrand died on May 8, 2022 at the age of 99. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Scientists from New York City Category:American aerospace engineers
title: Harry Dornbrand
